Grey Pink Red Purple Yellow White Blue Orange Green
kg 3 - 5 6 - 7 8 - 9 10 - 11 12 - 14 15 - 18 19 - 23 24 - 29 30 - 36

DEFIBRILLATION 2 - 4 J/kg

1st 4 J 7J 9J 10J 13J 17J 20J 27J 33J

0.1 mg 0.1 mg 0.2 mg 0.2 mg 0.3 mg 0.3 mg 0.4 mg 0.5 mg 0.5 mg

0.2 mg 0.3 mg 0.4 mg 0.5 mg 0.7 mg 0.8 mg 1 mg 1.3 mg 1.7 mg
0.05 mg/kg IV/IO MR q 5 - 10 mins until symptoms resolve

DEXTROSE 10% 8 ml 13 ml 42 ml 53 ml 65 ml 83 ml 105 ml 125 ml 125 ml
Give over 10 minutes 2 ml/kg IV/IO 5 ml/kg IV/IO Max dose 125 ml

4 mg 6.5 mg 8.5 mg 10.5 mg 13 mg 16.5 mg 21 mg 26 mg 33 mg

Concentration: 50 mg/ml 0.08 ml 0.1 ml 0.2 ml 0.2 ml 0.3 ml 0.3 ml 0.4 ml 0.5 ml 0.7 ml

0.01 mg/kg IV/IO MR q 3 -5 mins

EPINEPHRINE "Nebulized Epi" (Upper Airway/Stridor)
5 mg (5 ml) Via Nebulizer
Concentration: 1 mg/1 ml
